description:
The Vergers d'Épicure initiative, located in the canton of Geneva, Switzerland, is an agricultural cooperative focused on fruit and honey production while adhering to sustainable farming methods in harmony with nature. This cooperative aims to promote a food transition by raising awareness among its members about the importance of local food and the effort required for food production.

The Vergers d'Épicure operates on a cooperative model where members are required to commit a certain number of work hours per year to benefit from the harvests. The initiative strives to strengthen its activities and maintain a close connection to the land while fostering values of learning and knowledge-sharing.
name: Vergers Epicure
